tool_description: API used on https://anonurl.vercel.app service. Easy-to-use and anonymous.
name: URL Shortener
title: URL Shortener

api_list.name: Redirect
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener14.p.rapidapi.com/api/redirect/HbAzFX"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener14.p.rapidapi.com/api/redirect/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
